label:
This is an desktop notification that is sent to the subscribers of an event post 3 days before the event starts.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Title of event
##StartDate## - The start date of the event
##FullName## - Name of the subscriber receiving the notification

template.message: Dear ##FullName##, you subscribed to the event ##ActivityTitle## and it will start the ##StartDate##. Looking forward to seeing you there!
template.title: ##NotificationType##
